column3: An alternative suggestion would be to log changes to the mock time, instead of prepending it to every line, which causes vary long lines.

This looks reasonable to me, utACK.  This will fix the issues that `test/functional/combine_logs` has with tests using mocktime, right?\n\n@laanwj I'd personally prefer to have the extra timestamp on each line when using mocktime -- one use case I have is for my simulation environment, where mocktime is set on every message (tx, block, etc) that is delivered to bitcoind.  Adding an extra line fo
OK as this is only used for testing (and only a subset of the tests, as that) I'm fine with adding it to every line.
